00070  *

00072  * Security fix. Check various lengths of incoming packets.
00073  *
00074  * Revision 1.1  2007/05/02 11:18:31  haraldkipp
00075  * IGMP support added. Incomplete.
00076  *

00079 #include <net/if_var.h>
00080 #include <netinet/ipcsum.h>
00081 #include <netinet/igmp.h>
00082 #include <sys/socket.h>
00083 #include <netinet/tcp.h>
00084 #include <netinet/in.h>
00085 #include <errno.h>
00086 
00091 
00098 void NutIgmpInput(NUTDEVICE * dev, NETBUF * nb)
00099 {
00100     IGMP *igmp = (IGMP *) nb->nb_tp.vp;
00101 
00102     /*
00103      * Silently discard packets, which are too small.
00104      */
00105     if (igmp == NULL || nb->nb_tp.sz < IGMP_MINLEN) {
00106         NutNetBufFree(nb);
00107         return;
00108     }
00109 
00110     switch (igmp->igmp_type) {
00111     case IGMP_MEMBERSHIP_QUERY:
00112         break;
00113     case IGMP_V1_MEMBERSHIP_REPORT:
00114     case IGMP_V2_MEMBERSHIP_REPORT:
00115         break;
00116     default:
00117         /* Unrecognized message types are silently ignored. */
00118         NutNetBufFree(nb);
00119     }
00120 }
